nodes.bodyText:
@srnagar Any idea why this get changed?
I've got lots of unnecessary import (import of files in exact same package) for new code generated.
E.g.
In com.azure.management.resources.AliasType import com.azure.management.resources.AliasPathType.

Tried with some logging,
package_Keyword is com.azure.management.resources
import_Keyword is com.azure.management.resources.AliasPathType
So basically import_Keyword is package + class. equals will not work here.

@weidongxu-microsoft I see the issue here. I was going for com.azure.storage classes to be able to import com.azure.storage.implementation. So, startsWith also doesn't work. I will add a fix to this issue. Thanks for reporting!
